SELECT role.id AS role_id, role.create_by AS role_create_by, role.create_date AS role_create_date, role.update_by AS role_update_by, role.update_date AS role_update_date, role.remarks AS role_remarks, role.del_flag AS role_del_flag, role.office_id AS role_office_id, role.name AS role_name, role.enname AS role_enname, role.role_type AS role_role_type, role.data_scope AS role_data_scope, role.is_sys AS role_is_sys, role.useable AS role_useable,
menu.id AS menu_id, menu.create_by AS menu_create_by, menu.create_date AS menu_create_date, menu.update_by AS menu_update_by, menu.update_date AS menu_update_date, menu.remarks AS menu_remarks, menu.del_flag AS menu_del_flag, menu.parent_id AS menu_parent_id, menu.parent_ids AS menu_parent_ids, menu.name AS menu_name, menu.sort AS menu_sort, menu.href AS menu_href, menu.target AS menu_target, menu.icon AS menu_icon, menu.is_show AS menu_is_show, menu.permission AS menu_permission FROM sys_role role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON role.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu menu ON rm.menu_id = menu.id
